title: Bans!
body: I was wondering how the bans work. So far i have got a 5m ban, 10m ban and a 20m ban. What are the next bans and what does it go up to?

replies.body:
it only goes up to 20min u get it if u r afk or being really salty{{champion:238}} 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Hey Summoner!

What you're talking about there is called the LeaverBuster system. 

The times go up in 5 minute blocks until they reach a cap of 20 minutes. You cannot be perma-banned through this system, so the 20 minute low priority queue is the most severe punishment possible. You find more info on LeaverBuster [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

> **Quick Tip:** 
> If your connection is bad but you want to play League, then search the custom games list for something you want to play. Going unintentionally AFK in a custom game will not lead to any punishments. See more about that [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q4).

I think it goes up to 30 minutes, though repeated Ranked leaving may result in an account ban. Read here for more info on the Leaver Buster system and Low Priority Queues;

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ
